main event: Multiple witnesses observed an unidentified aerial object at Manhattan Beach, California, which appeared to be a bright silver elliptical object that broke up into seven smaller objects.
interesting points: The object was observed both visually and with binoculars,It was estimated to be at a very high altitude and high speed,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes,The event was witnessed by an ex-Navy pilot and seven other individuals,The object emitted no sound and left no exhaust trails.
sighted object: one bright silver elliptical object breaking into seven smaller objects
witness description: including an ex-Navy pilot and seven others
